website_summaries.verdict: Another high-quality choice for those seeking top-notch build, durability, and thickness.
pros: Option to purchase in 1.5" or 2" thickness
Constructed with thick vinyl covering for durability
Offers hook-and-loop strips on side for mat connection
cons: Some buyers complained that the product smelled like chemicals

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I am a father of an autistic teenager, and at times it can be tough. This mat is of very high quality. I have seen and felt lesser priced mats, and they do not offer the protection that this mat offers. From the packaging, to the quality of the covering and mat thickness, this mat is worth the money. As the pictures show, the mat comes in four sections. Each section is 2 feet by 4 feet, for a total of 8 feet in length combined. I highly reccomend this mat. I have not been paid for my opinion or review of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Provolone

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My little gymnast granddaughter has thoroughly enjoyed this...so much that her friend's parents bought one, and my other granddaughter had to have one as well. All are holding up well and allow padding for the constant tumbling, hand springs, cartwheels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ItsBarbara

customer_reviews.title: Great quality 2" thick mat!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality 2" thick mat. The foam is thick and supportive. The vinyl cover is high quality. No hook and loop but even better, there's velcro on the sides to easily and quickly lay more mats next to each other and keep them in place. I prefer the velcro than the hook and loop. The mats' price sound expensive but with the quality and sturdiness they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Totoro

customer_reviews.title: Love these mats
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality! My daughter uses them daily!! They are perfect for tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Jlynn123

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mat.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a large mat just to get down on the floor and exercise. This mat is extremely well built, yet it's light enough for one person to move around. It's also very firm. This isn't like a seat cushion or a mattress topper. It's much firmer. It gives just enough to kneel on and roll around on comfortably. And when I'm done it folds up easily and stands against the wall. The quality is such that it will last a long time. It was wrapped so well for shipping that it could have withstood anything. I have never seen a better packing job. This is a quality item that is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the cheapest but definitely not the most expensive. For the money I'll deal with a few minor issues. I bought 2 to make an area to train martial arts. There is a 1.5" gap in the padding when you join 2 mats. It can catch your foot if you're not Careful when training. The foam is dense enough to do some sparring drills and soft enough that break falls don't suck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too firm and not usable
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we didn’t like this product at all. The mat is too hard. I purchased the thicker foam in hopes of better padding too. These are nothing like the mats at the facility. I would not buy this again an I wouldn’t recommend it
customer_reviews.author: RRLRN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality gymnast mat
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mat for my up and coming gymnast. Great quality mat made of good material with thick padding. Easily folds up. Only knock is that it is kind of hard. That might be what you want if you are doing cartwheel and handsprings, but need something softer if you want a landing mat. Would also make a good exercise mat for crunches.
customer_reviews.author: Helps2Review

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around quite a bit before choosing this tumble mat! I made the right decision and can’t wait to buy another section to Velcro them together !My daughter is extremely 🤪happy with her pink/white gym/cheer mat. First day we took it to cheer practice and I got asked by a few moms where we got it! I like that your name is right on the mat☺️made it easy for me to tell them❣️ Getting it through prime made it even better because I didn’t have to pay for shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Starr

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product - Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible, as is the customer support. I bought to cover the entire floor of an upstairs bonus room to make it into a home exercise room/indoor Crossfit box. They are the right thickness and durable. I searched many types of rubber flooring products and needed something that could go over carpet and be removed. It can be confusing with so many choices for exercise flooring. HIghly recommend this solution, even if a little pricier.
customer_reviews.author: RGan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, dense foam, yet smells and isn't as tightly fitted in all areas as it should be.
customer_reviews.text: I give this a 3. This came in a very timely manner and the color green is beautiful. However I'm still Airing this out as I hate the smell of the dye. Is this really made in America? Also it isn't as taut as I would like it to be in areas. I really don't feel like sending it back to have this area tightened. It seems it should have been inspected before mailing it out. I'm sorry. I would have loved to give you a 5, however I can't due to these issues;. Sylvia C/.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Casillas

customer_reviews.title: The boys love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband and kids. They have been into martial arts for the last year or so and now use this mat for practice at home. It seems really durable, heavy use from three boys and their dad and no visible wear. It folds up and is easy to move and put away.
customer_reviews.author: mltrue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat for tumbling and flipping!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is absolutely thrilled with this mat!! He's a "flipper," and this provides all the cushioning he needs to prevent injury. He's happy with the 4' x 8' size, as well as the 2" thickness. Thanks for the quick delivery and the excellent product!!
customer_reviews.author: BaaBee3

customer_reviews.title: Great BJJ Mats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these mats (4x8) and linked them together for a small area to do basic BJJ drills.
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: VERY low quslity foam
customer_reviews.text: Well... after 1 month of use the foam is already breaking down and the wedge is losing its shape. One. Month. Save your money and spring for a "more expensive" one. This one is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A Mccalla

customer_reviews.title: Almost, not quite
customer_reviews.text: This mat does what it is designed to do. We used it as a safe place to land while doing gymnastics conditioning during isolation. I am a little disappointed in the cover. It is not completely tight on the mat. The quality is good and it is functional for the price so it was a good value. Resilite is a better quality mat but it is much more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Hallie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Ok but watch packaging if surprise!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is very good and my daughter is very happy with it. however if this is a surprise gift for your daughter know that this comes in a package that says "WE sell Mats" in several places on the packaging. This was a dead giveaway to my daughter as it arrived on the doorstep wrapped in a tarp and was a very large package that says "We sell Mats!"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This folding mat seems to me to be as good as what I would see in a workout gym. The covering material is smooth and comfortable. It would be nice if it had a little bit more "grip" to it though. Trying to do yoga poses on it, I found my hands slipping a bit. I have only been using it for a few weeks, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as 'soft' as they say....
customer_reviews.text: Some peoples' idea of "soft" may be very different from mine. This thing is as hard as a rock! Not easy to dance or move on. Ankles can twist. Harder still to want to lay on. Easily foldable, because I've folded it up and laid it aside.
customer_reviews.author: Double Shot Dopio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mats. Love the first one we bought at ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mats. Love the first one we bought at least a year ago. So when we needed a second one so we had more room for flips I knew exactly where I was getting it from. My daughters loves having alot of room for both of them to practice on. They two connect and stay together with the velcro that is on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: becky penz

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: SO HAPPY WITH THIS PRODUCT- PROFESSIONAL GRADE MATERIALS ON EVERYTHING. FIRM PAD THAT WILL LAST THE TEST IF TIME- varlco stops are just the right width to securely connect each mate to each other. ABSOLUTELY WORTH PAYING MORE FIR THESE MATES
customer_reviews.author: R. Hisle

customer_reviews.title: We have now bought 2 of these mats so my ...
customer_reviews.text: We have now bought 2 of these mats so my 9 year old has more room to practice her roundoff back handspring at home. Just make sure you have a rug underneath because it doesn’t slide
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Great mats
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 2" mats, very nice high quality mats. We use it for working out, 21 day fix, p90x, jiu jitsu and so on. We have them on the concrete floor in the basement and they never seem to slide around which is good. They are definitely not to firm like some reviews say, they are the same firmness as my jiu jitsu academy. Very fast shipping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but high quality.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this mat and uses it for practicing her dance/gymnastics routine. We've gotten others that were less expensive but didn't hold up very well. This one is high quality and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: online_shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for our basement
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler took Gymnastics last year and loved it. He was heartbroken when “summer break” meant he would miss gymnastics for a few months. We got this for our basement so he could keep doing his tumbling and basic moves. He loves it. Seems pretty decent quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality mat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality gymnastics mat. I purchased the 1.5" thickness for my elementary school daughter who does Acro and I wish that I had purchased the 2" thick mat. They have the 2" mats at the gym/dance studio where she dances and it has a little more cushion to it. However, it's a nice mat and we will keep it. I put it on a carpet and that seems to help add a little more cushion to it.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Mom

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to tumble and play on this mat! Each night we’ve been placing in the middle of our living room so my little one can show us her moves. And I find it great for myself to stretch and do yoga! It was stiff at first but easily breaks in within a few uses. Love this good quality mat for our family!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Toppins

customer_reviews.title: excellent mats. phenomenal quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Would buy again and again. I have 2 if these mats and they connect, fold up easy, and are easily moved as they are not heavy. The company contacted me shortly after purchase to ensure that I was satisfied and that nothing was damaged during transit. Quality service and quality product, I would strongly recommend this company and these mats over cheaper brands. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: HNB25

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mats!
customer_reviews.text: Mats are excellent quality, stitching is good, foam density and width excellent. My only gripe is the velcro is different from the brand I am using now, necessitating a change of plan for the new flooring. The tabs have the stiff, hook side facing up, and the down side is the softer pile side of the velcro and my original mats are reversed. I wish I had asked before purchase, but am pleased with the overall result.
customer_reviews.author: half-mad

customer_reviews.title: Super well made. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I’m using these for my horses to stand on and even with metal shoes not a tear or scrape. I assume they will hold up for humans! Just the right amount of padding. Seem very well made. Not slippery at all, not a cheap vinyl. Pay the extra to get these high quality ones!
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, great quality. We got them for practicing judo and gymnastics and we’re so impressed we purchased another.
customer_reviews.author: Veggi Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money and free shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect. Used them a few times now for BJJ and they will work well for a home gym. A bit too much material makes the mats not very tight but that is just nit picking. Update - Many months of hard use, still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nassar El Sonbatti

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and more!
customer_reviews.text: I've taken to exercising at home instead of going to a gym. But since I'm over six feet tall and 200+ pounds, typical at-home mats don't really give me enough support for all the strength training and dancing I like to do. I bought a single 2" blue mat, and it is exactly what I needed! It fits perfectly in my room, and I can do all the dancing around I want and my steps are muffled so as not to bother the rest of my family. Also arrived almost a week sooner than I though it would, so that's a huge plus! If you're making yourself an at-home gym, get one of these! It's well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: D. McCullough

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my mother-in-law's house. She keeps the 3 kiddos after school everyday. The two oldest (girls 8 & 6) are both in the tumbling & the youngest (boy 4) is just active. We rolled it out yesterday and they played, flipped, rolled, cartwheeled on the thing nonstop for 3 hours!! It is a lot firmer than I thought it would be. I figured it would be kind of squishy, like the foam mats kids sleep on in preschool...but NO! It's very firm and seems extra durable! I am VERY happy with this purchase. We will be buying at least one for our home!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my 5-year-old to practice gymnastics. He had been trying to do somersaults by slamming his body into the ground and wanted him to have something to pad his fall. I wanted one like the schools use, but this one is better. when it was delivered the large box was surprisingly light (ALMOST disappointed), but as I began to unwrap and unwrap and unwrap (This mat was incredibly packaged) the colors were solid and the product sturdy. The mat has incredible spring to it as you walk across it. It has the velcro to attach another/series of mats for professional applications. This is not a cheap mat!
customer_reviews.author: Game 5hark!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accent to my garage
customer_reviews.text: These look great sitting in the corner of my garage and work well when my kids finally decide to throw each other around on them.
customer_reviews.author: AdrienneK

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, Fabulous customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mat--perfect for an 8 year old to practice gymnastics skills at home. Even better, though, is the customer service. This was my second mat to be ordered from We Sell Mats. I had accidentally ordered the 1.5" thick option. A representative from the company noticed I had previously purchased a 2" mat and called me to confirm before shipping the item. Thanks to this fabulous attention to detail/customer service, the mistake was caught and the mat I had intended to order was shipped instead! Completely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: syncergy

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality mats! Im very impressed with them all around and I highly recommend them. I bought them for grappling (Brazilian Jiu Jitsu). The density and cushioning is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mike28

customer_reviews.title: My house is a tumbling studio now...
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and I have a heart attack every time I hear a bang from the other room and wait to hear screams of pain.. the screams never come so I guess that means the pads are doing their job
customer_reviews.author: Adam C.

customer_reviews.title: A Solid product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2 inch thick mat for my baby play ground. It is very solid, strong and well made. I am pleased to have it and would like to recommend it to anyone. Also i might buy another one to put together for larger coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old and 18 month old love this. They dance and play on it when ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and 18 month old love this. They dance and play on it when it is stretched out. They sit on it when it is folded up. I gave it 4 stars because it is harder than I expected it to be, and harder than I remember mats being when I was in gymnastics and from PE in grade school. Otherwise, it is a big hit in my household and I can see getting many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jandaya

customer_reviews.title: Takes and beating....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our 8 year old grandson. Took awhile, but he finally got it: a mat is WAY better than pillows (and easier on the pillows!). At first we thought maybe we should have gotten the 2" pad as his body slammed down again and again, but 1) the 1.5" works fine and 2) he's learning how to land better. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and easy to move
customer_reviews.text: These mats are durable and have held up well to daily use. They are not too heavy so the kids can move them around as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD MAT FOR KICKBOXING
customer_reviews.text: This mat is thick & just soft enough to make tumbling or kickboxing pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Reg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mat!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my level 6 competitive gymnast daughters second mat from We Sell Mats and it's a very nice well made mat. My daughter will use them in our yard to tumble on or she'll put one under her bars, and that works great too. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gymnastics mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice gymnastics mat. Using it for the base of a kip bar. Mat is firm as you would expect for a gymnastics mat. The Velcro that is used to attach another mat grips my carpet making it secure so it doesn't move, which is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Maxx

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice mat for my little gymnast! It's durable and has good cushion on it for her to practice on!
customer_reviews.author: AAKneisler

customer_reviews.title: Great home quality mats
customer_reviews.text: These are not commercial mats. In a commercial setting, I doubt that they would last all that long. However, in a home setting, they have been great. We use them for physical therapy for a family member. They also get used as stadium seating, etc. They wipe clean easily and have just about the right amount of squish vs firmness.
customer_reviews.author: asdf1234

customer_reviews.title: great gym mat
customer_reviews.text: For my daughter's tumbling, we chose the 2" mat; I think it's worth the extra cost. At first it has a strong odor, maybe from the vinyl or foam, but we let it offgas in the garage for a few weeks after unpackaging it before putting it in the basement to use. The material quality and workmanship are excellent and it looks like it will hold up well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Stitcher

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Came very quick and the package was in very good shape. The colors are very nice and the mat is a very good quality. Easy to fold up and store off to the side of the room. Planning on getting another to have a larger area for all the tumbling.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Kress

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. But note that they are made to connect to others and have a Velcro strip that extends from the side.
customer_reviews.author: majview

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mats for kids to practice their gymnastics tumbling at home.
customer_reviews.text: These are great mats for the boys to practice their gymnastics on. We have several of them set up in the garage on the cement floor and I was worried the 1.5" mats would be too thin but for tumbling they are just fine. The velcro holds the mats together nicely, my only complaint would be that the gab between the mats is about .75" not a big deal, I had just assumed they would fit flush.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Great Mats!!!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are fantastic! I bough two of the 4' x 4' x 2" and they are exactly what I needed for my basement home gym. I use them for aerobics and boxing workouts and couldn't be happier. They're a nice high quality and the velcro on all 4 sides is great & sturdy. Can't think of a negative with these, they're great! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: KJo

customer_reviews.title: So many great uses for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for kids. They use it to climb on, lay on, jump and play on, as well as making forts and tunnels. I a little expensive, but worth it considering all the uses my kids have come up with thus far, and my wife and I can use it for exercise as well. Item arrived on time, and seems of good quality
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend this. I’m 22 years old and I use it. Perfect for backhand springs, or to stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Good mat!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mat! I see it for training and it's holding up quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. I only gave 3 stars bc it smells SO bad.
customer_reviews.author: Panicdanic

customer_reviews.title: so I'm sure this one will be good too.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these two or three years ago for my granddaughters. They are still enjoying that one, but needed another one as their abilities are expanding. The first one has held up well to 4 growing girls and a move, so I'm sure this one will be good too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my order
customer_reviews.text: We received the mat within 2 days of ordering. The day my daughter received it she began using it. The mat is very durable and doesn't move around even with all the back handsprings. With all the practice she is doing at home with the mat her tumbling skills has improved. Very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The 2 inch mat is the way to go. Anything less than 2 inch would have been too thin for practicing front and back fall techniques. However, it is a bit on a heavy side. No complains though. Only reason I gave four stars is that vinyl smell is not going away after using the mat for past 2 or 3 weeks. The mat was spread wide in the well ventilated area for 2 or 3 weeks, but the smell is still there. Just remember to place the mat in the well ventilated area for at least two weeks before using it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very good for the excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very good for the excellent price. Dense foam, thick vinyl. Looks like they we work very well for our gymnastics and parkour classes.
customer_reviews.author: louthand

customer_reviews.title: Great mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Didn't smell as I've read from other reviewers. Nice fast delivery. My 9 yr old gymnastist daughter uses this in our bonus room for practice. Nice thick and quality. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Kgrim

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We have hardwood floors and my husband bought ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We have hardwood floors and my husband bought this for our boys to wrestle on. No more sore noggins and mat is still in great shape a month later
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Swanson

customer_reviews.title: ... 10 yr old is a dancer and has absolutely loved this mat
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old is a dancer and has absolutely loves this mat. We got the color pink and it has stayed clean. I wondered if the lighter color would get dirty quickly. Our mat didn't have the smell that some customers have complained about. She uses it inside and outside and has even gotten her back handspring since we've had this. She loves using it for both dance and tumbling. Great quality!! I accidentally ordered 2 and customer service was amazing to work with. I have been very impressed with this company! I would totally purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I love my new mat
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with my new mat. It's sort of large! but it folds up nicely and isn't too heavy for me to carry even though it doesn't have the handles some of the less expensive, but thinner mats have. It's wonderful to use when I do my exercise workout. no more bruises on my knees due to hard floors. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Kids home Brazillion Jui Jitsu fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Durable, light weight, and easy cleaning. My kids and I practice regularly on these and have not seen a problem yet in several months. The price is excellent compared to other sellers as well. The choice of multiple colors is a great plus to appease the genders.
customer_reviews.author: GZTCZB

customer_reviews.title: Work great for a 200lb man
customer_reviews.text: This mat works great for me (200+lb, 6ft man) so I can practice rolling techniques for martial arts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Professional quality. This is what you would expect in a gymnast mat in a real gym.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and cushy that my kid falls asleep on them!
customer_reviews.text: Theses mats are nice and thick and easy enough to move around that my 11 year old has no trouble with them. I was looking for a good quality mat that also didn't have the extra chemicals in them and these fit the ticket well. I think I will go do some stretching now on them...very comfy to exercise on!
customer_reviews.author: L.M. H.

customer_reviews.title: I think its good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas gift. Its April & still holding up to 2 kids & a big dog chasing them as they try to practice. I think its good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Very well made product
customer_reviews.text: Got the 2" and it's pretty firm, not soft like the dance studio mats. Perfect for serious exercises, not as good if you're going to be crashing into them by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Great for hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to put in our living room hardwood floors while our little guy was learning how to roll/crawl/stand/walk and they are great. Easy to clean, very durable, portable (we put them in the basement when not in use). He's walking now, but we always bring them out when our friend's babies are over and they are very impressed (we have 2 that velcro together into a big square). When he's a little older and can begin doing "gymnastics" I will use them for that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wollborg

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fine mat for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fine mat for the price. It is very easy for my 10 year old to move around the house but it is a substantial sized mat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING MAT
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVED it. She is now on a competition team, from practicing on this mat using you tube videos. She is amazing! This product was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lover of all things Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: This Mat is a Huge Hit with my Daughter
customer_reviews.text: Santa gave her the mat for Christmas and it has gotten more use than the floors on which it lies. It's great quality and folds up nicely so we can easily move it up and down the stairs 100 times a day, depending on where the gymnastics event is being held (usually in the vicinity of my wife and I).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mat. Exactly what I was hoping it would ...
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Exactly what I was hoping it would be. The perfect firmness, it’s not so hard it doesn’t provide a good cushion for a fall but also not too soft either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice high quality construction. Ours took a beating and was still able to resell at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great mat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old gymnasts as a bday gift. She LOVES it! Perfect size. It fits her balance beam perfectly. She can do all her stretches and practice her tumbling. The mat is very sturdy. She loves the colors (we got lime green and blue). It even came a day early. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Large Mat
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. From the reviews I was expecting this to be a little soft....not !! Very firm. Good mat and I believe it should last me a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality mat!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 and a Level 4 gymnast -- she got this mat for her birthday in August and really wanted another one from Santa. Now she has two velcroed together and can do multiple back handsprings, etc. Great mat-she uses it just about every day! I had read previous reviews that the mat has a chemical odor. If ours did have any, it dissipated immediately and was not an issue. Shipping was quick and mat was packaged well and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mat.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is great for my seven year old gymnast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old girl loves it for cartwheels and tumbling. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: New mommy

customer_reviews.title: These are great mats, packaged well and shipping was on-time
customer_reviews.text: These are great mats, packaged well and shipping was on-time. As with any fold-up portable mat it would be nice to reduce the gap between mats. For these particular mats it seems I can get them close but not as tight as the folded sections. Not a problem but just need to be aware of it when training.
customer_reviews.author: Dr J

customer_reviews.title: My kids love it. I don't have to worry about them ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. I don't have to worry about them hurting themselves when they practice their flips.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: My kids like flopping around on this mat
customer_reviews.text: My kids like flopping around on this mat. While it is cushier than carpeted floor, it is a bit harder than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: KReece

customer_reviews.title: Well made practice pad
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter and she loves it. Folds to store and is large enough for her practice moves. Thick padding.
customer_reviews.author: J S Rush

customer_reviews.title: GREAT MAT!
customer_reviews.text: such a GREAT QUALITY mat! no matter how many times it has gotten folded thrown around it is still holding up. after a year(2016) it's soft enough but still hard to keep the form of the mat. if that makes any sense...
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Island

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her mat. Only problem was the ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her mat. Only problem was the Velcro on the bottom kept sticking to the rug and making it hard to move around. Should be designed with the fuzzy part of the Velcro on the bottom instead of the rough side that sticks. I placed felt strips over the Velcro and that helped. The mat is heavy enough that it doesn't move around.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👏
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter. She loves it. Very happy. Her friends and her have so much fun on the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Janet DesRuisseau

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 8 year old learning to tumble
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. My 8 year old daughter is learning to tumble and I needed a mat that gave me peace of mind that she could practice safely. This mat met all my expectations. Good price, quick shipping, well built, and light enough for her (my 8 year old girl) to move up and down stairs by herself. Would purchase again without question. Another plus is that they are modular so they can be integrated with additional mats (via velcro) to create a larger surface area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Mat for safeties!
customer_reviews.text: Mats were better than the school mats! Easy cleaning up and I am comfortable with my daughter trying to perfect her hand springs. And it is easy to pick up and put away ). With safety top of mind, this is the mat for you!!
customer_reviews.author: Svobs

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my baby was about 4mo. She is two now and has a little brother. We get SO much use out of the mat and it's still in perfect shape. Wipes clean!
customer_reviews.author: GLane

customer_reviews.title: Back Hang Springs Here I come!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the gymnastic mat I purchased and I'm considering purchasing another one as well. Thank you, VS

customer_reviews.text: My niece loved it. She now practices some of her gymnastics routine at home. Well made and can connect to additional mats if need.

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for inside gymnastics for my 10 year old. Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dog Boy

customer_reviews.title: i use this as my mattress
customer_reviews.text: and why not? firm, cheap, lasts a long time. I put blankies down and then my sheets and my regular blankies. It will probably last me another 15 years like the first one did. Since i'm not using it as a gym mat, it lasts longer. great product, shipped quick, folds up to one panel wide.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great mat for gymnastic tricks!
customer_reviews.text: The mat arrived quickly and is well made. I like that it has velcro on the sides and it sticks to the carpet so it doesn't shift around when my daughter is doing tricks on it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nony

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome!! My daughter practice on it all the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!! My daughter practice on it all the time! It's lightweighted enough that my 8 yr old can pick it up herself and put it away. i love how durable the material feels and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a durable and good size mat for their child to practice gymnastic moves with.

product_meta.title: We Sell Mats 4 ft x 8 ft Gymnastics Mat, Folding Tumbling Mat, Portable with Hook & Loop Fasteners
feature_bullets: GYMNASTICS MAT FOR JOINT PROTECTION: Home gymnastics floor mat comes in 1. 5”-2” thickness for a cushioned, supportive surface that protects knees, wrists, elbows and backs for home workouts, tumbling and other fitness routines.

EASY TO CARRY AND STORE: Foldable design makes it portable and compact for storage, with hook and loop fasteners and lightweight foam for convenient on-the-go-fitness for personal trainers, athletes, exercising outdoors our indoor workouts.

VERSATILE USAGE: For many lifestyle and activity needs, our Gym Tumbling Mats provide safe cushioning for light fitness exercises, yoga, Pilates, playroom flooring, stretching, wrestling, cheer, martial arts & MMA, and indoor rock climbing.
PERFECT FOR KIDS & YOUNG GYMNASTS: Durable and cushioned pads provide safety and reassurance for your young gymnast as they practice tumbling, cartwheels and back handsprings.

EASY CLEAN-UP: Unfold over any hardwood floor or flat indoor surface for extra padding needed when exercising. Vinyl surface resists tearing and is easy to wipe clean with a simple soap and water solution.
